step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job completing the first roll! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Ensure your shoulders stay down and back.
Excellent! You're really getting the circular motion down. Keep the movement smooth.
Fantastic finish to the second roll! You're doing great with shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when pulling your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.
